info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 8:44AM CDT until May 18 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Grand River near Little Eagle affecting Corson County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Grand River near Little Eagle.
* WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, low-lying pasture and hay land along the river begins to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM MDT Saturday was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 4.8 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by late tonight at midnight MDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
